title: Is Bishop Barron's Catholic God Non-Theistic in Vervaeke Terms? How does it play out?
description:
I was listening to Rafe and John and then Barron and O'Connor on Unbelievable thinking about how Bishop Barron was framing god as compared to John's non-theism. There's a lot of similarity. 

@John Vervaeke and @Rafe Kelley on Non-Theism https://youtu.be/pyJIhxyc4BI
@Unbelievable? with @Bishop Robert Barron and @CosmicSkeptic https://youtu.be/aC9tKeJCJtM

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/XF4w6deK
